translations: （户外穿着用的）派克大衣；皮制大衣

sentences.sentence: My phone rings in my parka pocket.
sentences.translation: 手机在我的皮大衣口袋里响了起来。

sentences.sentence: Weather will be cold — bring your parka.
sentences.translation: 天气将会很冷——需携带皮大衣。

sentences.sentence: Simon: your socks are in your boots and your earmuffs are in one of your parka pockets.
sentences.translation: 赛门：你的袜子在你的靴子里，耳罩在你防寒大衣的其中一个口袋里。
